text: Nta n’ikindi kitubuza kohereza ibitangaza (abahakanyi basaba), uretse kuba abo hambere (barabisabye) bakabihakana (nuko tukabarimbura; bityo n’abandi babihawe bakabihakana twabarimbura). Kandi twahaye abantu bo mu bwoko bwa Thamudu ingamiya ari igitangaza kigaragara, nuko baragihinyura (iyo ngamiya barayica). Ndetse nta kindi gituma twohereza ibitangaza bitari ukuburira (abantu) no kubatinyisha (ibihano by’Imana)
